# Arman Munshi â€” Portfolio (3D photo parallax) (Ready to Deploy)

This is a Next.js portfolio project (dark mode, animated) created for Arman Munshi.
The uploaded photo is included and displayed with a 3D parallax effect (rounded).

## Quick start

1. Install dependencies:
```
npm install
```

2. Run locally:
```
npm run dev
```

3. Build for production:
```
npm run build
npm start
```

## Deploy

Push this repo to GitHub and import it to Vercel for automatic deploys.
